title: How to Get the Fortnite Crown With Discord Quest Rewards

steps.title: The Fortnite crown was a limited-time Discord Quest reward.
steps.content: The Fortnite crown was a limited-time Discord Quest reward. This Discord Quest was active during the launch of Fortnite's Reload game mode, which ended on July 4, 2024. If you completed the quest in this time, you were rewarded with a temporary victory crown design for your Discord avatar. The Fortnite crown decoration was temporary and was removed from all avatars in September 2024. Discord may launch another similar quest in the future. You can check for current quests by visiting the Discord website . You can also click the Discover tile on Discord and select the Quests tab. See the next section to see how to complete Quests to earn rewards.

steps.title: Launch Discord.
steps.content: Launch Discord. You can only complete Discord Quests on the Discord desktop app or website using a Windows or Mac computer. Currently, Linux devices are unsupported. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the "Discover" tile.
steps.content: Click the "Discover" tile. This is the green tile with a compass at the bottom-left corner of Discord.

steps.title: Click Quests.
steps.content: Click Quests . This is the tab underneath Servers . You'll see a list of all current quests here.

steps.title: Click Accept Quest.
steps.content: Click Accept Quest . This is the purple button within the game tile. You should see a preview of what you need to do to complete the quest.

steps.title: Complete the quest.
steps.content: Complete the quest. The requirements will differ per quest, but it usually involves playing or streaming a specific game for 15 minutes. Make sure you have Discord open as you play. To make sure your game time counts, confirm the game is added in Settings > Registered Games . You can check your quest progress in the Quests tab.

steps.title: Click Claim Reward.
steps.content: Click Claim Reward . You'll see this in the Quests tab. You may also receive an in-app notification.
